activities: McVeigh Associates plans meetings/events/programs/incentive trips and collects participants information from European attendees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line and On-line Data for Clients' and their Customers to attend company meetings / events
recoursemech: McVeigh Associates makes a commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) as well as the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), and their authorized representatives. To investigate unresolved complaints McVeigh Associates will use an outside arbitration and mediation mechanism, such as those offered by JAMS, that agrees to hear each complaint in compliance with the Safe Harbor Framework(s).
